title: "Jake Paul is a Combat Sports vulture!" Tyron Woodley speaks to Ariel Helwani
author: BT Sport Boxing
description:
Former UFC champion Tyron Woodley speaks in depth to Ariel Helwani ahead of boxing debut against Jake Paul in a heated grudge match.

Watch #PaulWoodley on BT Sport Box Office on Sunday 29 August - https://www.bt.com/sport/box-office/

Subscribe to BT Sport Boxing on YouTube ➡️ http://www.youtube.com/c/btsportboxing
